= Download Area =

Since Google has stopped supporting downloads on google projects, there is no chance to add new versions of mvp4g to the download area.
New versions of mvp4g will be found as maven dependencies.

If you do not use maven, you can download the new versions from this page.

=== Fixed Issues ===

 * NotFoundEvent not fire for child module events. (Issue 112)
 * Multiple presenter failed to inject itself to the enclosed reverse view (Issue 115) 
 * Error should be thrown if historyOnStart is set to true for child module. (Issue 121)
 * Patch for update mvp4g for last gin 2.1.2 and gwt 2.6.0 (Issue 128)

=== Improvements ===

 * Support IncrementalGenerator for SuperDevMod.
